import React, { useState } from 'react' import Axios from 'axios' import { connect } from 'react-redux' import { Redirect, Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { login } from '../actions' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { Table, Button, Form, Modal, Image } from 'react-bootstrap' const CartPage = () => { const { products } = useSelector((state) => { return{ products: state.product.products } }) const [table, setTable] = React.useState([]) React.useEffect(() => { Axios.get('http://localhost:2000/cart/get/:id') .then(res => (setTable(res.data))) .catch(err => console.log(err)) }, []) return (
{table.map((item, index) => { if (this.state.selectedindex === index) { return ( ) } return ( ) })}
No Name Image Price Quantity Total Action
{index + 1} {item.name} {item.size} IDR {item.price.toLocaleString()}
this.changeQty(e)} value={this.state.newQty} min={0} />
IDR {(this.state.newQty * item.price).toLocaleString()}
{index + 1} {item.name} {item.size} IDR {item.price.toLocaleString()} {item.quantity} IDR {item.total.toLocaleString()}
) } export default CartPage
